findings.title: Revisited Calculation of Skim Amount
findings.description: The USDPlusAsset contract does not properly take the pending fee and the tip bucket into consideration when calculating the skim amount that the owner can skim from the USD+ pool.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Wombat protocol, there is a privileged account, i.e., owner, that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations.

findings.title: Suggested immutable Usage for Gas Efficiency
findings.description: Declare state variables as `immutable` to reduce gas costs when reading from storage, especially for variables that are only written once and remain constant throughout the contract's lifetime.
